_tutorial.info: This file contains all the product categories for your store.
how_to_add_a_new_category: 1. Copy an existing category block (from the opening '{' to the closing '}').
2. Paste it at the end of the list, just before the closing ']' bracket.
3. Change the values for the new category:
- 'id': A new, unique number (e.g., if the last one is 9, make this 10).
- 'name': The display name for your category (e.g., 'T-Shirts').
- 'slug': A URL-friendly version of the name. MUST BE UNIQUE, all lowercase, and use hyphens for spaces (e.g., 't-shirts'). If a slug already exists, add a number (e.g., 't-shirts-2').
- 'image': The URL for the category's image. You can use 'https://placehold.co/600x400' as a temporary placeholder.
